summary: Network administration veteran with extensive experience building, improving, supporting and architecting ASP-type infrastructures.

experience.title: IT Consultant
experience.description: Implemented and managed IT infrastructure; Designed and managed Windows Active Directory Network (Windows NT 4.0, Windows 2000-2012 servers); Managed MS Exchange, MS SQL, SuccessWare21, Symantec Backup Exec, Kaspersky Virus Protection servers, and SonicWall Firewalls; Managed and supported Tadiran PBX, AEONIX Contact Center, and CSI (VO) Call Accounting servers; Developed and implemented secure remote access solution for sales consultants and field service technicians; Provided hardware and application support for in-house and field service personnel; Installed and troubleshot applications and services on Windows and iOS devices; Network design and installation (Windows Networking, Active Directory); Hardware/Software installation and configuration; Remote access solutions, including secure wireless technologies; Email and database development services; Performance monitoring and tuning; Server sizing and capacity planning; Disaster recovery and business contingency planning; Vendor liaison and product selection; 24x7 network and application monitoring; Comprehensive network support agreements.

experience.title: Sr. Systems Engineer/Project Manager
experience.description: Provided field service in maintenance, installation, and deployment of networking and document management solutions for law firms and other clients in the Southeastern United States. Responsibilities included project management of server and network installations, upgrades and conversions; daily monitoring and troubleshooting of servers and networks; Citrix Metaframe 1.8, Citrix Metaframe XP, Citrix Nfuse; 24-hour on-call support; Researched and defined client/server security architecture and provided technical leadership for planning and deployment of Citrix solutions. Worked on WAN and LAN solutions for Windows NT 3.51, NT 4.0, WFW, and Windows 95 environments; Installed and configured Internet access and remote access, and system redundancy including RAID and server mirroring technologies; Promoted to Director of Operations in December 1996; Washington Region; Supervised five employees; Managed projects implementing client/server and Internet solutions.

experience.title: Network Analyst/Director of Operations
experience.description: Developed WAN and LAN solutions for various clients in Windows NT 3.51, NT 4.0, Windows 95 environments; Install and configure Internet access, remote access, system redundancy including RAID and server mirroring technologies; Supervised and coordinated a team in Washington region; Led project implementations of client/server and Internet solutions.

experience.title: Technical Analyst
experience.description: Installed, maintained, and operated computer hardware and software; Supported inter-office telecommunications, electronic mail and Internet services; Served as System Administrator to Windows NT LAN supporting 150 users; Administered SQL Server and PCDocs databases; Coordinated with other offices regarding telecommunications procedures and implementation of new technologies; Interacted with vendors for acquisition of software and hardware; Member of Morrison & Foerster Networking Taskforce; Conducted feasibility studies preceding client/server technology deployments; Evaluated NetWare, Banyon Vines, Pathworks and Windows NT; Aided nationwide implementation of client/server technology; System integration and conversion from VAX/VMS, Decnet, 56K to Windows NT, TCP/IP, Frame Relay Network.

education.degree: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate Level

certifications: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate Level
